title: ‘Good Luck With Aliens’: Pilot-ATC Conversation After 'UFO'-Aircraft Encounter Over Rhode Island
description: A private jet pilot flying over Rhode Island reported a bizarre encounter with a small silver UFO at 3,500 feet, sparking questions about unexplained aerial phenomena (UAP) in U.S. airspace. The pilot described the object as hovering beside the aircraft, appearing to stand still before disappearing. Air traffic control confirmed no other sightings, while the FAA states that corroborated reports are shared with the UAP Task Force. This follows similar sightings, including one over a U.S. air base in Britain in 2024, fueling speculation about alien or secret aerial technology.

title: 'Good Luck With the Aliens': Rhode Island Pilot's Viral UFO Encounter Leaves Air Traffic Control Baffled
description: Pilot reports mysterious silver canister hovering near aircraft at 3,500 feet as air traffic control admits they have no explanation for the object

title: Pilot reports UFO hovering beside jet, leaving air traffic control stunned: 'Good luck with the aliens'
description: New video reportedly reveals pilot's eerie encounter with mysterious silver cylinder hovering near aircraft wing over Rhode Island, leaving pilot baffled.

title: Pilot reports UFO hovering beside jet, leaving air traffic control stunned: 'Good luck with the aliens'

title: Is That a UFO, or Just the Air Force’s Newest Plane?
description: The U.S. military has one of the most diverse and advanced fleets of aircraft in the world. With a superpower like America, one might assume that all the country’s aircraft represent cutting-edge technology, but this isn’t always the case. Some combat aircraft flying today hit the scene decades...
